document.full_text: the head of the audit committee at renren inc has resigned to protect the chinese social networking company from any possible fallout from accusations of accounting fraud at another company where he is an executive.
document.title: renren's audit committee chair quits ahead of ipo
lines_and_colors: the head of the audit committee at renren inc has resigned to protect the chinese social networking company from any possible fallout from accusations of accounting fraud at another company where he is an executive.
